attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The rights of the British citizens are under attack, silenced in the name of anti-terrorism, ignored for the plight of multicultarlism, forgotten for the sake of tolerance.
Racial Hate laws and incitement of terrorism acts threaten the very existence of freedom of speech, freedom of thought and freedom in Great Britain.
We must enact a constitution, so no future government can try to silence anybody, no matter however ignorant or hateful the person or speech is, free speech shouldn't a right for those who follow the governments thinking, all voices should be heard and a constitution should guarantee it.
Human rights and legal rights should be protected by the constitution.
Unjust restrictions on freedom should not be accepted under the vague banner of anti-terrorism, anti-communism or any future threats this country may face.
Freedom of religion must be given to all.
As one looks at the freedoms we have lost, one must not let them further disappear, for freedom is worth fighting for.
